title: You must provide your legal name and birth date. Birthdate (except for year) will be displayed on your profile.

tosdr.case: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed
tosdr.tldr: From terms of use: "You agree to provide accurate information upon registration. This includes your own name, your own valid email address, and your own date of birth. This information must remain accurate, and must be updated if your circumstances change."
